subject: Education
title: A Baby's Brain: 1 Million Connections Per Second
description: Learn A Baby's Brain: 1 Million Connections Per Second in one minute.

hook.text: A newborn's brain forms 1 million neural connections every second. No computer on Earth can match that speed.

buildup.text: Babies are born with roughly 100 billion neurons but few connections. Every sight, sound, and touch wires them together.

discovery.text: By age 3, a child's brain has twice as many synapses as an adult's. The brain overbuilds, then prunes what's unused.
